title: Ultimate Fiji Family Holiday (Two Kids Stay Free) with Romantic Adults-Only Upgrade Available
description: Escape to a private island paradise on Fiji’s Coral Coast at one of the most iconic resorts in the South Pacific: Shangri-La’s Fijian Resort & Spa. This escape truly offers something for everyone: families will benefit from two kids (aged 11 years and under) staying and eating free, as well as two complimentary sessions of babysitting, while couples can indulge with a romantic adults-only upgrade. Recently refurbished, the resort now features an adults-only wing with dedicated private pool and restaurant. Experience a warm Fijian welcome, where aquamarine waters and palm-fringed sands provide the setting for an unforgettable family or couples' escape. Enjoy a daily breakfast, three dining experiences (please refer to 'Fine Print' for full Resort Dining Programme details), two 30-minute massages each, authentic Fijian experiences and much more.
offer_address: Yanuca Island Coral Coast Fiji Islands, Fiji

title: Ultimate Fiji Family Holiday (Two Kids Stay Free) with Romantic Adults-Only Upgrade Available
description: Escape to a private island paradise on Fiji’s Coral Coast, at one of the most iconic resorts in the South Pacific: Shangri-La’s Fijian Resort & Spa. This escape truly offers something for everyone: families will benefit from two kids (aged 12 years and under) staying and eating for free, while couples can indulge with a romantic adults-only upgrade. Recently refurbished, the resort now features a brand-new adults-only wing with dedicated private pool and restaurant. Experience a warm Fijian welcome, where aquamarine waters and palm-fringed sands provide the setting for an unforgettable family or couples' escape. Enjoy a daily breakfast, three dining experiences, two 30-minute massages each, authentic Fijian experiences and much more. Two kids (aged 12 years and under) stay and eat for free - and with two complimentary sessions of babysitting included, it leaves you free to make the most of the spa and on-site restaurants!

title: Fiji Iconic Shangri-La Escape on Yanuca Private Island with All-Inclusive Dining & Roundtrip International Flights with Fiji Airways for Two Adults
description:
Aquamarine waters, mesmerising coral reefs and pure white sand: Fiji truly is the pinnacle of barefoot luxury. Succumb to total relaxation at the recently refurbished Shangri-La Yanuca Island, Fiji, a blissfully laidback resort located on the private Yanuca Island. Stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice award 2021, this idyllic island haven is the perfect oasis for families and couples who want to escape the rest of the world and soak up the serenity.

One of the first international hotel brands to take up residence in Fiji, Shangri-La Yanuca Island, Fiji offers a slice of paradise like no other. Experience impeccable luxury amid a breathtaking landscape and all-inclusive indulgence, effortlessly matched by world-class Shangri-La service that is infinitely local in its friendly Fijian approach. Boasting a seemingly endless myriad of ingredients for an unforgettable stay - including five waterfront restaurants, three relaxed bars, three expansive pools (including a kids' pool and an adults-only pool for Reef Wing guests), a private untouched beach with preserved reefs, kids' club, serene spa, complimentary tennis courts, games room and much more - this beautifully renovated, sunkissed resort will leave you spoiled for choice.
offer_address: Yanuca Island, Coral Coast, Fiji Islands, Fiji

title: Fiji Coral Coast Indulgence with All-Inclusive Dining, Massages & Two Kids Stay, Play and Eat Free
description:
Step into a private island paradise at this Shangri-La sanctuary, where golden sands, swaying palms and aquamarine waters await. Nestled on Fiji's Yanuca Island and seamlessly connected to the mainland by a bridge, this Coral Coast gem is the perfect blend of seclusion and indulgence. Savour all-inclusive dining, where every craving is satisfied. Unwind in paradise while kids delight in endless fun as they stay, play and eat free.

Wake to the sound of gentle waves, then dive straight into island life - float in the lagoon-style pool, sip cocktails at one of three beachfront bars, or surrender to relaxation at the ocean-facing spa. Thrill-seekers can snorkel vibrant coral reefs or tee off at the nine-hole golf course, while little explorers make memories at the Kids’ Club.

Ideal for families, the Yanuca Wing offers effortless access to water sports, the lagoon, beach, kids' club and restaurants, meaning everything is taken care of. For a more exclusive escape, stay in the adults-only Reef Wing, where a private infinity pool and serene ocean views await. Whether you’re seeking family adventure, romance or pure relaxation, this is your dream island escape.
offer_address: Yanuca Island, Coral Coast, Fiji Islands, Fiji
